Marc Kagan/TWU Local 100 Oral History Interviews
Marc Kagan/TWU Local 100 Oral History Interviews

Interview subjects include: Stanley Aronwitz, Joe Campbell, Ken Carl, Anita Clinton, Vic Constantino, Bruce Dickstein, Steve Downs, Tony Feliciano, Chris Fox, Joel Fredericson, Jim Gannon, Joe Gayol, Robin Gillespie, Arthur Goldberg, Bill Gottlieb, Sonny (Harold) Hall, Larry Hanley, Kevin Harrington, Joe James, Dave Katzman, George MacAnanama, John McCarthy, Terry Meginniss, Gene Monette, John Mooney, JP Patafio, Louis Russo Jr., Roy Schulman, Robert Schwab, Arthur SChwartz, Michael Scott, Jesse Sharkey, John Simino, Eileen Sullivan, Marian Swerdlow, Tim Schermerhorn, Mike Tutrone, Jarvis Tyner, Nick Unger, and Progressive Action.
